channel.title: Windows 7 client running
channel.description:
ok so my friends been needing on help on how to run a clinet with windows 7(64 bit) and im going to show you how to make it work ok.
step 1.open your client files. step 2.edit the run.java step 3.ok now you should some something like JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI or what ever yours is now you see where it sais JAVA- thats where you're going to add this. "C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe" ok so now this is how it should look like. "C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx500m
HOPE THIS HELPED NEED MORE HELP ADD ME ON MSN- jacobo380@Hotmail.com or send me a messaghe on this THANX COMMENT :D

item.title: Windows 7 client running
item.dc:creator: @wc_master1 wc master1
item.description:
@wc_master1 wrote:

ok so my friends been needing on help on how to run a clinet with windows 7(64 bit) and im going to show you how to make it work ok.

step
1.open your client files.
step
2.edit the run.java
step
3.ok now you should some something like
JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI
or what ever yours is now you see where it sais JAVA- thats where you’re going to add this.
“C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe”
ok so now this is how it should look like.
“C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe” -Xmx500m

                        HOPE THIS HELPED NEED MORE HELP ADD ME ON MSN- jacobo380@Hotmail.com or send me a messaghe on this THANX COMMENT :D
